Text: Thought i'd be fancy and comment my thoughts, works perfectly. to clear things up, if previously launched, no need to re-install. just delete the .ils in the unity editor folder. and replace the .exe while activating, go to manual, then find license and click it. :D all done!

Worked like a charm for the current version (3.5.4 - which seems to be the same as 3.5.3f3).

Many thanks!!!

Hey guys I'm getting this after i install:

Mono Class PostProcessAttribute couldn't be found! This might lead to random crashes later on!

and it wont let me play nor build, it exits....any clue?

Yea its not an absolute fix.  In fact I can't even use this anymore, it is invalid now.
The problem with it is when you want to Build and Run a Windows platform game, it returns an error and you can't play it.  Webplayer works fine.
